description.value:
Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Force, Implement

Standard

Ranged 20

+14 vs Reflex; 2d4+9 force damage.

At-Will ✦ Implement

Standard

Close burst 3

+14 vs Fortitude; 1d6+9 damage, and the target is pushed 2 squares.

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Implement, Lightning

Standard

Ranged 10

Targets 1 primary creature in range and 2 secondary targets within 10 squares of the primary target; +14 vs Reflex; 2d6+9 lightning damage to primary target, 1d6+9 lightning damage to secondary targets.

Daily ✦ Conjuration, Force, Implement

Standard

Ranged 10

+14 vs Reflex; 1d10+9 force damage. Sustain minor: sword attacks again. Move action: move the sword to a new target within range.

Encounter

Minor

The tiefling's next attack against a target that hit him since his last turn gains a +1 power bonus to the attack roll and pushes the target 1 square if it hits.
A tiefling gains a +1 racial bonus to attack rolls against bloodied foes.

Encounter ✦ Healing

Standard

Arat Karavakos spends a healing surge and regains 39 hit points. He gains a +2 bonus to all defenses until the start of his next turn.

Daily ✦ Lightning, Thunder

Free

After resolving a power that has the lightning or thunder keyword, the staff deals 1d8 lightning and thunder damage to every creature in a close blast 3.
